segments.text: Mr . Green , I ’ d like to introduce you to Mr . Brown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you do , Mr . Brown ? It ’ s a pleasure to get to know you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My pleasure , Mr . Green . I look forward to an excellent relationship with your company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I propose a toast to the health of everyone here and to the success of our negotiation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , let ’ s make a toast .
segments.speaker: S1
